osvSchema.summary: xaviershay-dm-rails Gem for Ruby exposes sensitive information via the process table
osvSchema.details:
xaviershay-dm-rails Gem for Ruby contains a flaw in the execute() function
in /datamapper/dm-rails/blob/master/lib/dm-rails/storage.rb. The issue is
due to the function exposing sensitive information via the process table.
This may allow a local attack to gain access to MySQL credential information.

description_data.value: ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem. When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.

advisories.description: The `execute` function in the xaviershay-dm-rail package exposes user credentials to the process table in `/datamapper/dm-rails/blob/master/lib/dm-rails/storage.rb`
advisories.solution: There is no solution for this vulnerability at the moment.
advisories.title: MySQL credential exposure
